original: Lange, Axel Mauritz, direktör, Uddevalla, f. 11/12/82 i Uddevalla av dir. Emil L. o. Hedvig Kafle. G. 11 m. Elsa Lange. Barn: Torsten f. 12, Gertrud 16. — Stud. v. Uddevalla ele-m:lärov. 91-95, priv. stud. 96-98, CTI99-02. Anst. i faderns firma E. G. Lange i Uddevalla fr. 02, prokurist 04, deläg. 14, chef f. Gbgs o. Boh. L. Vedbyra 15-17, f. bränslekomm. länsbyrå i Uddevalla 17-19 o. f. bränslekomm. för-valtn. i v. Sv:e 19-20, verkst. dir. f. Sv. Hand:bankens avd:kont. i Uddevalla 20-24, dito f. E. G. Lange A-B i Uddevalla sed. 25. V. ordf. i hand:-kamm. f. Värml., Dalsland o. Bohusl., ordf. i dess lokalrepr., ordf. i direkt, f. Llddevalla ■sjöm:hus, led. av styr. o. huv:man f. Uddevalla Sparbank, led. av stadsfullm. 27-34, led. av stadsfullm. beredn:utsk. 29-34, av hamnstyr. 21-39, ordf. där 33-39, led. av hand:- o. sjöfartsndn 17-38, ordf. i styr. f. Sv. Hand:bankens kont. i Uddevalla o. Uddevalla Kafé A-B, förest, f. kristidsstyr. bränslekont. i Uddevalla 40-47. RVO 20, FMM, SM.
translated:
Lange, Axel Mauritz, director, Uddevalla, born on December 11, 1882 in Uddevalla, son of director Emil L. and Hedvig Kafle. Married on November 11, 19xx to Elsa Lange. Children: Torsten, born in 1912, Gertrud, born in 1916. 

Studied at Uddevalla elementary and high school, 1891-1895, private studies, 1896-1898, and CTI from 1899-1902. Employed at his father's company E. G. Lange in Uddevalla from 1902, promoted to assistant manager in 1904 and became a partner in 1914. He was the manager of Goteborgs och Bohus Lantbruk Vedbyra from 1915-1917, and of the fuel committee county office in Uddevalla from 1917-1919, and the fuel committee administration in western Sweden from 1919-1920. 

He was the executive director of the Swedish Handelbanken branch in Uddevalla from 1920-1924, and the executive director of E. G. Lange A-B in Uddevalla since 1925. Vice chairman of the chamber of commerce for Värmland, Dalsland and Bohuslän, chairman of the local representatives, chairman of the board of directors for Llddevalla shipyard, member of the board and head chairman of Uddevalla Savings Bank, member of the city council from 1927-1934, member of the city council preparatory committee from 1929-1934, member of the port authority from 1921-1939, chairman from 1933-1939, member of the trade and shipping commission from 1917-1938, chairman of the board for the Swedish Handelbanken branches in Uddevalla and Uddevalla Café A-B, leader of the fuel control during the wartime in Uddevalla from 1940-1947. 

Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa in 1920, FMM, SM.
